record.field:
✨ Neon Nights: Glow Party


Get ready to light up the dance floor! Neon Nights is the ultimate glow-in-the-dark experience, where black lights, neon body paint, and electrifying beats come together for one unforgettable party.

🎶 Music: High-energy house, EDM, and club anthems all night long

💡 Atmosphere: UV lights, neon décor, glowing accessories

🎨 Extras: Free glow paint & bracelets at the entrance

👗 Dress code: Wear white or neon — the lights will do the rest

Join hundreds of partygoers for a night that shines brighter than any other. Whether you’re here to dance till sunrise or just vibe in the glow, this is the event you don’t want to miss.

💫 Tickets are limited — secure yours now and let’s glow!
Light up the dance floor — the night shines neon bright

🎤 Hip-Hop Takeover


Step into a night where the bass hits harder and the flow never stops. Hip-Hop Takeover brings you the best in old-school classics and today’s hottest tracks, blended seamlessly by our live DJs.

🎶 Music: From Biggie & Tupac to Drake & Kendrick

🔥 Vibes: Booming bass, freestyle drops, and MCs hyping the crowd

💡 Atmosphere: Urban beats, flashing lights, pure energy on the dance floor

👟 Dress code: Streetwear, sneakers, keep it fresh

The mic is hot, the floor is packed, and the party doesn’t slow down until sunrise.

🎟 Tickets move fast — grab yours and take over the night!
Bass, bars, and beats — hip-hop all night long

🎧 Techno Underground Session


Enter the depths of sound with Techno Underground Session — a night of raw beats, hypnotic rhythms, and immersive visuals. Lose yourself to the pulse of Berlin-inspired underground techno, right here in your city.

🎶 Music: Minimal, industrial, and deep techno from international guest DJs

🌌 Atmosphere: Dark room, heavy bass, smoke & strobes, underground vibe

🎛 Experience: Extended DJ sets & immersive visuals for full immersion

👕 Dress code: Black, edgy, minimal — keep it underground

For those who live for the rhythm, this is more than a party — it’s a movement.

🎟 Strictly limited tickets — secure yours and descend into the underground.
Lose yourself in deep beats and Berlin-style techno

💃 Latin Fever Friday


Bring the heat to the dance floor with Latin Fever Friday — the night that sets the club on fire with the best of salsa, bachata, reggaeton, and cumbia.

🎶 Music: Latin beats from guest DJs straight out of Madrid & beyond

💃 Atmosphere: Couples spinning, hips shaking, tropical rhythms

🍹 Extras: Special mojitos & tequila shots all night long

👗 Dress code: Casual chic with a splash of color

Come with a partner or find one on the dance floor — everyone dances at Latin Fever.

🔥 Secure your ticket now and join the fiesta!
Turn up the heat with salsa, bachata & reggaeton vibes
